New Records: Adolis Garcia hit a grand slam in Game 6 of the ALCS
Key Match Events: Adolis Garcia hit a line-drive grand slam to put the game out of reach
Jonah Heim added a two-run home run off Framber Valdez
Mitch Garver had three hits including a key solo home run and RBI double
Pre-Game Insights: Bryan Abreu's pending two-game suspension for hitting Adolis Garcia in Game 5 has Astros fans feeling a certain type of way
Post-Match Reflections: The Texas Rangers continued the 'road-field advantage' trend of this ALCS, beating the Houston Astros 9-2
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros' CRAZY home-road splits continue
Game 7 of the 2023 ALCS will take place Monday at 8 p.m. ET on FOX and the FOX Sports App
Others: Nathan Eovaldi maintained his reputation as a big-game pitcher, allowing just two runs on five hits over 6.1 solid innings
